title: MacBook Pro "Core i7" 2.8 15" Mid-2015 512 16GB AC 2019
description:
MID 2015 Macbook Pro Retina 2.8 i7 16GB 512 SSD Warranty til 2019 El Capitan OSX  
 
no BOX just Charger included. NO LOWBALL OFFERS Acknowledged  
 
Meet in public place Starbucks etc or Police station if you prefer as this is a cash only transaction.   
 
email or sms text for included software bundle  
 (Dual Graphics/Force Touch PAD) AMD R9370X 
 
The MacBook Pro "Core i7" 2.8 15-Inch (Dual Graphics/Force Touch - Mid-2015 Retina Display) features a 22 nm "Haswell/Crystalwell" 2.8 GHz Intel "Core i7" processor (4980HQ), with four independent processor "cores" on a single silicon chip, a 6 MB shared level 3 cache, 16 GB of onboard 1600 MHz DDR3L SDRAM (which cannot be upgraded later), 512 GB or 1 TB of PCIe-based flash storage, and dual graphics processors -- an AMD Radeon R9 M370X with 2 GB of dedicated GDDR5 memory and an integrated Intel Iris 5200 Pro graphics processor with 128 MB of "Crystalwell" embedded DRAM (and shared system memory). It also has an integrated 720p FaceTime HD webcam and a high-resolution LED-backlit 15.4" widescreen 2880x1800 (220 ppi) "Retina" display in a case that weighs just less than 4.5 pounds (2.04 kg). It does not have an internal optical drive. 
 
Connectivity includes 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0, two USB 3.0 ports, two "Thunderbolt 2" ports, an HDMI port, an audio in/out port, and an SDXC card slot. 
 
In addition, this model has a backlit keyboard, a new advanced "Force Touch" trackpad, a "MagSafe 2" power adapter, and an internal, sealed battery that provides an Apple estimated 9 hours of battery life. 
 
Full Specs here  
 
http://www.everymac.com/systems/apple/macbook_pro/specs/macbook-pro-core-i7-2.8-15-dual-graphics-mid-2015-retina-display-specs.html

title: MacBook Pro 15" 2012, 2.3GHz i7, 16GB, 1TB HD, 256GB SSD, 90D Warranty
description:
I purchase computers in bulk from various companies throughout California so you can rest assured that none of my computers are stolen and since I am able to buy in bulk, I am also able to provide a 90 day warranty and a secondary limited 1 year at-cost guarantee on all of my computers so you can be sure that you're purchasing a quality machine that will work for years! I have other computers available that you can view by clicking on the "more ads by this user" box and even some that aren't listed on Craigslist yet so feel free to ask if you're looking for something else. I can also do custom orders as well such as installing dual hard drives, making fusion drives, upgrading ram, etc.  
 
 
This specific model was the last "Unibody" design made by Apple where the components are user replaceable instead of soldered onto the logic board like the new Retina models. I have installed a new 1,000 GB (1 TB) Samsung hard drive, maxed the ram out to 16 GB, removed the DVD drive to install a secondary 256 GB SSD and to top it all off the two hard drives are recognized as a single "Fusion" drive by the computer. This means the computer itself will automatically manage what files go on which hard drive so that the operating system, programs and files you use the most are available in an instant and load up to 10 times faster than a traditional hard drive! The battery is also brand new with only about 4 cycles on it, and since they're designed to last for at least 1,000 cycles you'll find years of use without issue! Everything is working perfectly including all ports and peripherals like camera, microphone, bluetooth and keyboard. The computer is in excellent condition with normal wear and tear but nothing major like a dented corner or water damaged components. You're more than welcome to test everything out before purchasing and I'd be happy to help you make sure everything is in tip top shape.

description:
Apple MacBook 6,1 13.3" Laptop white 2GB 250GB 1.067 GHz OS X 10.6.8 Snow leopard edition

Detailed item info 
Product Information 
Enhance your computing performance with the redesigned, better than ever Apple MacBook. The durable, unibody enclosure does not snag, and slips easily into and out of your bag. With a 2.26 GHZ Intel Core Duo 2 Processor, 2 GB of RAM, and integrated nVIDIA GeForce 9400M Graphics, the MacBook is a powerhouse that easily handles simple browsing, video games, graphic design, music, and video editing. Additionally, your graphics look beautiful on a 13.3-inch diagonal LED-backlit glossy widescreen display, with a built-in iSight camera and an internal omnidirectional microphone. An 8x slot SuperDrive, Gigabit Ethernet Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR, and a full-size keyboard, allow connectivity and efficiency wherever you go.

 Product Specifications: 
 
Apple MacBookThe MacBook "Core 2 Duo" 2.26 13-Inch (White Polycarbonate "Unibody" - Late 2009) unveiled a new "glossy white unibody" case design -- modeled after the previously introduced "Unibody" MacBook and MacBook Pro models -- but uses polycarbonate rather than aluminum and has a "non-skid" rubberized bottom surface. 
 
Like the aluminum "Unibody" models, this system also has a four-finger "multi-touch" glass trackpad and an integrated battery design that is not intended to be replaced by the end user. Apple reports that this battery design increases runtime, and as a result, this model provides "up to" 7 hours compared to 5 hours for the model itreplaced. 
 
This model is configured with a 45 nm "Penryn" 2.26 GHz Intel "Core 2 Duo" processor (P7550) -- with two independent processor "cores" on a single silicon chip -- a 3 MB shared "on chip" level 2 cache, a 1066 MHz frontside bus, 2 GB of 1066 MHz DDR3 SDRAM (PC3-8500) installed in pairs (two 1 GB modules), a 250 GB Serial ATA (5400 RPM) hard drive, and an 8X DL "SuperDrive". It also features a NVIDIA GeForce 9400M "graphics processor with 256 MB of SDRAM shared with main memory" and a 13.3" widescreen TFT active-matrix LED-backlit "glossy" display (1280x800 native resolution). 
 
Connectivity includes AirPort Extreme (802.11a/b/g/n), Gigabit Ethernet, two USB 2.0 ports, a single audio in/out port, and a Mini DisplayPort that supports an external display at 2560x1600.

title: APPLE 85W MAGSAFE POWER ADAPTER (for MacBook Pro with Retina display)
description:
UNOPENED. BRAND NEW BOX. 
 
 
 
The 85W MagSafe 2 Power Adapter features a magnetic DC connector so if someone should trip over it, the cord disconnects harmlessly and your MacBook Pro stays put safely. It also helps prevent fraying or weakening of the cables over time. In addition, the magnetic DC helps guide the plug into the system for a quick and secure connection. 
 
When the connection is secure, an LED located at the head of the DC connector lights up; an amber light lets you know that your notebook is charging, while a green light tells you that you have a full charge. An AC cord is provided with the adapter for maximum cord length, while the AC wall adapter (also provided) gives you an even easier and more compact way to travel. 
 
Designed to be the perfect traveling companion, the adapter has a clever design which allows the DC cable to be wound neatly around itself for easy cable storage. 
 
This power adapter recharges the lithium polymer battery while the system is off, on, or in sleep mode. It also powers the system if you choose to operate without a battery. 
 
Compatible with MacBook Pro with Retina display.

title: 2012 15" MacBook Pro with Retina Display for Sale! Comes with Extras!
description:
Hello Craigslist, 
 
I have a 2012 15" MacBook Pro for sale. Here's a quick list of the specifications for it: 
 
-MacOSX Sierra  
-Retina display: 15.4-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2880-by-1800 resolution at 220 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors 
-2.3GHz quad-core Intel Core i7 processor (Turbo Boost up to 3.3GHz) with 6MB shared L3 cache 
-8GB of 1600MHz DDR3L onboard memory 
-256GB Harddrive 
-Intel HD Graphics 4000 
-NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M with 1GB of GDDR5 memory and automatic graphics switching 
-MagSafe 2 power port 
-Two Thunderbolt ports (up to 10 Gbps) 
-Two USB 3 ports (up to 5 Gbps) 
-HDMI port 
-Headphone port 
-SDXC card slot 
-802.11n Wi-Fi wireless networking;3 IEEE 802.11a/b/g compatible 
-Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology 
-Stereo speakers 
-Dual microphones 
-Full-size backlit keyboard with 78 (U.S.) or 79 (ISO) keys, including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys (inverted "T" arrangement) with ambient light sensor 
-Multi-Touch trackpad for precise cursor control; supports inertial scrolling, pinch, rotate, swipe, three-finger swipe, four-finger swipe, tap, double-tap, and drag capabilities 
 
For any other questions about the specifications, you can find them at the Apple page here: https://support.apple.com/kb/sp653?locale=en_US 
 
I have always kept the laptop in a hard shell case which will come with it. The hard shell case is a little beat up and due to some dust and other things getting in it, the bottom of the MacBook Pro does have some minor scratches on it. However, the inside and top of the MacBook Pro are perfect and show no signs of wear. I've only ever used the laptop for photography work and have just recently upgraded to a desktop so I'm looking to sell my Macbook Pro.  
 
The laptop comes with a brand new charger that was bought very recently for it. I also have the original box and manuals for it too. 
 
I'm asking $700 firm for everything and will not go any lower so please do not ask. I'm also not interested in any trades so again, please don't ask. 
 
I'm actually located in Sacramento, but for anyone coming from the Bay Area, I'm willing to meet in Vacaville, but no farther than that. And we'll meet at a local Starbucks so that you can test the wifi and anything else you'd like on it.  
 
So, If you've got $700 cash in hand and are willing to drive to me and meet in person, then please feel free to email me or, preferably, text me at 916-Eight-Three-Three-9530. Thanks and have a nice day!

Selling off my fantastic Gopro HERO 4 Black Go Pro Hero4 Black action camera. 
Camera is awesome, no scratches to lens, comes with battery, and $40 extra for accessories. 
 
I can travel to meet up, preferably lunch time. Live in Glendale work in South Phx. 
$280 for the Camera or $320 for the everything. 
-Brian K 
 
GoPro HERO4 Black Action Camera: Capture the world around you in stunning 4K resolution and super slow motion at up to 240 frames per second with the GoPro 4 Black.  
Product Features 
Capture high-quality 4K video 
-With resolutions of 4K30, 2.7K60, 1440p80, 1080p120, 960p120 and 720p240 for ultrasharp, clear footage. 
-Ultrawide-angle glass lens captures an expansive field of view for stunning videos and photos. 
-Ultrawide, medium and narrow field-of-view options allow you to select your perspective. 
-Capture low-light scenes using Night Photo and Night Lapse modes 
-Customize exposure settings for single and time lapse photos. Auto low-light mode adjusts frame rates based on lighting conditions for optimal low-light performance. 
-Capture stunning 12.0MP photos and burst photos up to 30 fps 
-Take high-resolution photographs suitable for cropping and enlarging, or hold the shutter button down for burst shooting up to 30 frames per second (fps). 
-Turn your camera on and begin recording with the touch of a single button 
-QuikCapture one-touch activation ensures you get the shot even when things happen fast. 
-Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth make it easy to edit, watch and share 
-Use the GoPro app (download required) or Smart Remote (sold separately) to wirelessly transfer, watch and edit photos or video, and share them online. 
-Protune delivers cinema-quality video 
-Features manual settings for frame rate, color, ISO limit, exposure and other settings for more dynamic photos and videos. 
-Create a time-lapse video automatically 
-Time-lapse mode lets you select from various time intervals without the need to edit. 
-Tag key moments for easy reference while recording or playing back videos 
-Use the HiLight Tag function on the Smart Remote or GoPro app to zip right to the spot you want to watch or edit. 
-Standard waterproof housing 
-Waterproof down to 131' when enclosed in housing. 
-Wearable, mountable design lets you catch all the action from the first-person perspective 
-Record the action as it happens -- hiking, biking, skiing and more. Compatible with most GoPro mounts. Curved and flat adhesive mounts included. 
-Record crisp, clear audio. Built-in microphone records with minimal distortion and a high dynamic range. 
-microSD memory card slot 
-Supports select memory cards for expansive storage capabilities (memory card not included). 
(www.bestbuy.com)

title: 15 inch MacBook Pro retina (i7, 16gb, 512gb) dual graphics
description:
I'm selling my beloved 15 inch MacBook Pro with retina display, 16 GB of RAM, and 512 GB solid-state hard drive space. 
 
macOS Sierra 
Version 10.12.2 
 
Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel core i7 
Memory: 16 GB 1600 MHz DDR3 
Graphics: Dual 
    -Nvidia GeForce GT 750M 2048 MB 
    -Intel iris Pro 1536 MB 
 
I find it important to understand why someone is selling; below are my reasons: 
 
This is my absolute favorite laptop and was perfect for my first two years of medical school. I am no longer in the classroom and I am constantly on the go. I am unable to fit a 15 inch computer in my whitecoat pocket; as a father, I hardly have an opportunity to 'sit'. I hope to pass on this wonderful device to someone who will appreciate it as much as I do and will benifit from it more than I can.  
 
I proudly say it isn't free of any blemishes as this laptop is too useful to keep in a closet untouched. There is one small indentation in the middle of the right speaker grille, peraps the laptops most vulnerable location to a falling frigerator magnet (couresey of my 2-year old son). The back right external corner also shows wear (multitidue of times entering and exiting my bag). 
 
This is the very last Macbook Pro Retina prior to apple implementing the force touch trackpad. If you are familiar with apple products over the past 10 years, you already notice the absence of Steve Jobs. My Macbook Pro is his last design . My machine has an ethereal charm that is missing on the new force touch models. Perhaps it's sentimental, but see for yourself if you wish.

title: StreamSmart Pro
description:
The top of the line: StreamSmart Pro Available. 
 
StreamSmart is the ultimate smart TV box that streams in 1080 HD and 4K with NO MONTHLY FEES or contracts. No Annoying Ads or Pop-Ups.  The StreamSmart receiver will give you Unlimited Access to every Movie, TV show, live sporting event, and 3D movie! You can watch almost every movie ever made, including New Releases still in theatres.  Sick of waiting for your favorite TV shows to show up on Netflix? Wait no longer, you will have every episode when it airs!   Can you use an extra $60-$70 a month? No more DVD Rentals and Late Fees.  You no longer have to pay for any PPV event or movie,  such as UFC, Boxing, or WWE? Stream them all live in HD with StreamSmart!  Cancel your NFL Sunday ticket, or  "Red Zone", NBA League Pass, and NHL Center Ice! All are free with the StreamSmart receiver in HD!  Adult channels are available with parental controls.  Don't get fooled by buying a cheap hacked device that only gives you a glimpse of what is possible. StreamSmart has negotiated agreements with carefully screened Channel Providers, so you do not have to pay any subscription fees. 
 
Is StreamSmart legal? It's a big Yes! We are 100% legal. StreamSmart boxes are highly optimized computers that allow you to STREAM your content rather than DOWNLOAD content. Since you never have an appreciable amount of the content at any one given time, you never violate any copyright or ownership of what you are viewing. It's also a reason we do not even put a hard drive in our device. Simply stated, ownership is the law -- If you download, that's illegal. . . If you stream, that is not.

title: StreamSmart-Pro
description:
StreamSmart is the ultimate smart TV box that streams in 1080 HD and 4K with NO MONTHLY FEES or contracts. No Annoying Ads or Pop-Ups. The StreamSmart receiver will give you Unlimited Access to Every Movie, TV shows, live sports, and 3D movies! You can watch almost every movie ever made, including New Releases still in theatres. Sick of waiting for your favorite TV shows to show up on Netflix? Wait no longer, you will have every episode the night it airs! Can you use an extra $60-$70 a month? No more DVD Rentals and Late Fees. You no longer have to pay for any PPV event, such as UFC, Boxing, or WWE? Stream them all live in HD with StreamSmart! Cancel your NFL Sunday ticket, or "Red Zone", NBA League Pass, and NHL Center Ice! All are free with the StreamSmart receiver in HD! Adult channels are available with parental controls.  Don't get fooled by buying a cheap hacked device that only gives you a glimpse of what is possible.  StreamSmart has negotiated agreements with carefully screened Channel Providers, so you do not have to pay any subscription fees. 
 
 
Is StreamSmart legal? It's a big Yes! We are 100% legal. StreamSmart boxes are highly optimized computers that allow you to STREAM your content rather than DOWNLOAD content. Since you never have an appreciable amount of the content at any one given time, you never violate any copyright or ownership of what you are viewing. It's also a reason we do not even put a hard drive in our device. Simply stated, ownership is the law -- If you download, that's illegal. . . If you stream, that is not. 
 
Specifications:

Supports photo formats: JPG, JPEG, BMP, GIF, PNG

Full HD Support, ability to utilize USB mouse, keyboard operation and 2.4G QWERTY Remote 
1.4 and AV output and Component (YPbPr) output that's suitable for any TV and display 
Skype/MSN/QQ 
Android Video: Youtube, XBMC

Support all standard SD/HD/UHD video output formats: 480i/p, 576i/p, 720p, 1080i/p

MCU power on/off by remote control

title: 1992 s10 pro street or trade for???
description:
1992 gmc Sonoma/ chevy s10 up for sale, it's a project that needs minimal work to get roadworthy. I just don't have the time or will to finish it now. So offering it up for sale to see what happens. Not desperate to sell it either, I know what it's worth and won't let it go too cheap. It's a super clean pro street build with a daily driver in mind. All orignal Equipment in the truck works fine ac, heater, wipers,lights...exct 
 
Mods list 
 
Pro street rear end,  
ford 9 HD axle housing 
moser 31 spline billet axles 
Detroit tru trac posi 
3.75 Richmond gears 
willwood 4 piston disc brake setup with internal parking brake 
locar parking brake cables (not yet installed) 
inland empire custom HD driveshaft 
moroso billet u-joint griddles 
insane innovations made the traction bars with hiem joints for the rear end 
qa1 rear coilover kit with 150lb springs in the rear 
belltech 2' front drop kit (springs,shocks and drop spindals) 
new balljoints, tie rods, and all front steering coponents 
built 700r4/4l65 trans, 5 pinion planatarys,  
shift kit 
2800rpm pro torque converter 
be-cool aluminum radiator setup with fans, aluminum overflow, and electric thermostat (currently not installed, have the OEM cooling system in the truck) 
built 4.3 v6, comp cam, new heads, TBI setup..was planning on a sequential rear mounted turbo setup that would defenently brake into the 600 horsepower range 
custom billet grille, front bumper and front spoiler with extensions that wrap around the fenders 
street scene mirrors (heated mirror with signals)  
custom tail lghts 
fiberglass rear roll pan 
zo6 chrome 18' wheels with brand new 295/35/18 tires (only have a pair) 
interior is in great condition,  
Camaro bucket seats (some tears, not bad) 
autometer 3 gauge pod 
autometer c2 trans temp gauge 
autometer c2 oil temp gauge 
autometer c2 air fuel ratio gauge 
tilt steering collum  
 
That's all I can think of off the top of my head, there is defenently more parts to the list. I will have to sort through the recepts. 
 
now for the bad- The truck is not done. It needs a little work to run/drive under its own power.   
Fuel- Need to install and plumb the gas tank. Was planning on running a custom 14 gallon fuel cell but im loosing intrest in the project 
Brakes- rear brake lines need to be plumbed as well. Need a hardline to a T, that branches out to each caliper.  
Suspension- Need a custom panhard bar. Summit sells a kit for the 9' housing for about 120 bucks.  
 
Im loosing intrest in the project due to my work schedule. I thought id have time to finish the truck before summer hit but the way things are looking currently it would have to wait till next year. I work in the HVAC industry and we are currently builsy. Don't have the time to finish it. and really don't want to pay a shop to finish something that I can do. So I thought id throw it out for sale and see if I get any offers. I may also be interested in a trade. Im looking for a fullsize truck. Suburban 4x4,Classic chevy trucks, or something like a Silverado single cab short bed, or a dually... those would be at the top of my list. but shoot me any offer for trade. worst I can say is no! thank you for reading!

title: KRANK Formula 6 Driver, 10.5 loft
description:
If you know about the longest drivers out there, the professional long drivers, all the winners hit KRANK. This is the current model in the lineup. 
 
What you might not know, is that KRANK is a local company. So whether you go to their headquarters or buy online, the best and longest costs big bucks. $449 to be specific. 
 
Best thing is, you don't need to be a pro long driver to benefit from a club designed to hit it longer and straighter.  
 
Shaft in this stick is a Fujikura Inertia 2 Tour. Flex is Stiff+, perfect for a good golfer, swing speed 95 to 105 mph. 
 
This one I bought from a golf pro and has no visible marks on the face, crown or sole. Since I was recently in a car-totaling accident and will be a while before I get back to the links, I'm only looking to get back what I have in it. 
 
So before you buy a Taylor Made, Callaway, Ping, Titleist, Nike, Cobra, Mizuno or anything else, check out this world beater. Features Fujikura Tour shaft (stiff+), Pure grip and KRANK headcover. 
 
-----------PLEASE INCLUDE PHONE # WITH REPLY--------IF POSTING IS VISIBLE, ITEM IS STILL AVAILABLE-------------

title: Comic Books - All are now $1 each
description:
***All comics are now $1 and you can pick and choose. These didn't sell as a lot but they need to go so come get a handful for $1 each.*** 
 
I am selling off my entire comic book collection. There are a little over 520 books total. The collection is mainly Marvel but there is also some DC, Image, etc.  
 
Marvel titles include Deadpool, Spider-Man, X-Men and spin-offs (Wolverine, Gambit, etc), Avengers and spin-offs (Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Hawkeye, etc). There are soooooo many more. 
 
The DC books are mostly Batman, some Harley Quinn, and some others. 
 
For Image there are a few Walking Dead books, Outcast, Chew and some random others. 
 
There are some TV show adaption books too.... Angel, Orphan Black, Mortal Kombat, Jay and Silent Bob and more. 
 
There are horror books... zombies and such. 
 
A handful of older books in there too... from 70's and 80's 
 
There are quite a few collectible books in there too! There are some small runs and key issues mixed in there. 
 
[$2 Books] There are some magazines and a couple graphic novels as well. I have a bunch of signed books too. Original TMNT books signed by Kevin Eastman with COA. There are some TMNT magazines also signed and numbered by Eastman also with COA and a few other Image books signed by authors at comic shows. These are worth a lot more than this but they need to go so they are all being sold for $2 each. 
 
All books are in great and collectible condition. I bought a bunch of them from a store that went out of business so they were flipped through and some do have some spine stress but nothing major. Just about all of them range from VF+ to NM or NM-. Of course there are some older books that are lower than that. I'm not a pro grader.

title: Dell Latitude E6500 Intel+ 128GB SSD Windows 10 Business-Grade Laptops
description:
______________________________ 
 
**If this ad is still up, they are still available. Check quantities below, there are only a few left. Prices have also been lowered for a quick sale.** 
 
Hello, I'm selling (20) of our Dell Latitude Intel Core 2 Duo business laptops that were used in a professional, clean environment - never personal use/etc. Latitude laptops are Dell's high-end enterprise grade machines and are built to last. These are all relatively low-use and in great condition. 
 
Intel Core 2 Duo processor (P8700 2.53ghz), 2GB of RAM, Intel HD graphics, wifi, fingerprint reader (on most), webcam, 15" high resolution screens, VGA and DisplayPort video out, eSATA port, DVD RW, good batteries (a few have extended life batteries), power supplies included, and a clean installation of Windows 10 Professional already activated with Microsoft, upgraded properly from Windows 7 Pro. 
 
These come installed with 128GB Samsung SSD (solid state) hard drives. The price is $160 for the SSD laptops; we can also upgrade the RAM before you come pick them up to 4GB for $10 more (while supplies last). This is recommended for Windows 10, you can easily upgrade the RAM yourself in the future - it's a very simple procedure on these. 
 
(4) Laptops with 128GB Samsung solid state drives remaining - $140 
 
Priced for a quick private sale; I'm open to offers for purchasing multiple laptops or all at once. Please contact me by email at first with any questions or for my contact information. They have all been cleaned, updated, tested and are 100% ready to go. I'm located in NE Mesa, near the point on the map. Thanks!

title: 2003 Custom Pro Street Motorcycle
description:
VETTE CULTURE  
MESA, ARIZONA  
 
 
480-807-8000 
 
 
 
2003 Custom Pro Street motorcycle (Built in 2003, first registered in 2004). Fantastic bike! 
 
* Pro Street chassis by Deliverance Cycles 
* Bike built by Unique Cycle Creations 
* 6 speed Baker transmission 
* HD Evolution 1340 motor with mid-range performance cam 
* Dual Weber side draft carbs 
* Pro One brake calipers 
* Custom paint by "Bad Ass" out of Los Angeles 
* Dakota Digital display 
* Inverted forks with brand new seals 
* Rear tire 230/60/15 
* Arlen Ness headlight 
* 13,648 original miles 
* Excellent condition 
* Have build pictures and build details 
 
 
 
VETTE CULTURE FINANCING AVAILABLE ON ALL CARS WITH VERY COMPETITIVE RATES WITH TERMS UP TO 84 MONTHS. SIGN AND DRIVE.   
Please visit us at WWW.VETTECULTURE.NET  to view our additional inventory! 
 
Hablamos Espanol! 
Por favor si tiene alguna pregunta contactenos. 
 
All of our vehicles go through our extensive Vette Culture inspection prior to sale at our Performance/Service Center (see below for details). Comprehensive "bumper to bumper" Extended Warranties are available for all of our stock or custom built/modified Corvettes. 
 
*FOR THE COMPLETE VETTE CULTURE EXPERIENCE, PLEASE CALL AHEAD TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING APPOINTMENT. 
*Please serious inquires only. 
*Please contact us with questions by phone. 
 
 
Corvette Super Retail/Performance Center: 
As a specialty Corvette Center we operate a professional, comfortable, no pressure environment for our clients.  Because we show our cars by appointment only we can and do take the time to know our clients' needs - saving you time and money.  Vette Culture is Owner operated, which means you are working directly with a decision maker that has a long term interest in your satisfaction. 
Our Corvette retail/service facility is a Corvette enthusiast's paradise. Our inventory is stored indoors within our 12,000 square foot showroom and is available for viewing by appointment only. 
For our out-of-town clients, we are conveniently located within a 20 minute drive east of Phoenix-Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) and directly adjacent to Falcon Field Airport (FFZ) for those clients arriving by private aviation.  We are happy to offer our clients complimentary ground transportation between the airports and our facility. 
At Vette Culture, we are here to make purchasing your vehicle as easy as possible. We can coordinate shipping with one of several licensed and bonded transportation companies to deliver your vehicle direct to your door.  Costs will vary depending upon the desired level of service (for example, open carrier vs. enclosed carrier). 
 
All of our vehicles go through our extensive Vette Culture inspection prior to sale at our Performance/Service Center. 
 
The Vette Culture comprehensive inspection includes (very broadly): 
 
-Paintwork and trim condition (searching for crash damage, new paint and poor workmanship, established corrosion). For the early cars this would include a more detailed body (fiberglass) check. 
-Underbody and suspension condition. 
-Wheels and tire condition. 
-Operation of brakes and brake disc/pad condition. 
-The engine and transmission external condition (oil leaks, coolant and consumables condition, corrosion). 
-The interior and rear hatch compartment (wear and tear leather/carpet). 
-Operation of electrical equipment. 
-Basic document check (original equipment/service book/Navigation discs). 
-Experian car data/background check. 
-GM VIN verification and in service records (covers original equipment ordered/bulletins and recalls/in service date and build date verification). 
-On the C5/C6/C7 models, including the 1997-onwards OBD ECM/PCM cars, we use GM Tech 2 diagnostic equipment to analyze and diagnose all ECM/PCM data (faulty censor/diagnostic codes and history checks). 
 
At the Vette Culture Performance Center we offer pre-engineered packages and complete design-build services for your custom Corvette project. Covering all Parts, Accessories, and Performance needs for the C2/C3/C4/C5/C6/C7 Corvette. 
Our Performance Center capabilities include:    
-Custom paint and body. 
-Custom interiors (high grade leather/suede hides). 
-Custom wheels and tires/Powder Coating/Chrome/Paint. 
-Custom one of a kind fabricated products/modifications. 
-Headers and Exhaust systems/one of a kind custom built exhaust systems. 
-Superchargers. 
-Performance Cam packages for the LS1/LS2/LS3/LS6/LS7/LS9/LT1/LT4 and more. 
-Performance Engine building/ECM Precise Performance Tuning. 
-Suspension adjustments/lowering/coil overs. 
-Brakes/Caliper/Rotor packages. 
-Vette Culture brand products made specifically for your Corvette. 
-Comprehensive Extended Warranties for stock or modified Corvettes. 
 
Our Service Center capabilities include: 
-ONE STOP SHOP-We can do it all at the Vette Culture Performance Center. 
-Vette Culture is a certified GM Tech 2 and HP Performance Tune Center. 
-I-CAR Certified. 
-Routine maintenance. 
-Corvette diagnosis and repair experts. 
-Warranty service work. 
- Minor and major performance modifications. 
-Cosmetic transformations/restoration. 
-Wheel and tire packages at very competitive prices. 
 
TERMS OF SALE: 
Vette Culture makes no representations, expressed or implied, to any actual or prospective purchaser or owner of this vehicle as to the existence, ownership, accuracy, description or condition of the listed vehicle's equipment, accessories, price, specials or any warranties. Any and all differences must be addressed prior to the sale of this vehicle. 
 
Advertised prices exclude License, Title, Registration Fees, State or Local Taxes or Delivery Fees/dealer document fee. The dealer document fee is $399.00 and will be added to the final sales price. 
 
PROPER VENUE: All obligations pursuant to this contract shall be performable in Maricopa County, in the state of Arizona. All obligations of purchaser to pay for the vehicle shall be payable in U.S. dollars in Maricopa County, Arizona. The buyer and Vette Culture agree that in relation to any transaction involving this vehicle that the proper venue for any legal proceedings will be conducted in Maricopa County, Arizona. 
DO NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers

title: Massive 85L Backpack LOADED with BRAND NEW Camping Gear & Daypacks!!!
description:
Massive 85L Backpack LOADED with BRAND NEW Camping Gear & Daypacks!!!  
 
> > > IS SPRING IS RIGHT AROUND THE CORNER? NO! IT'S HERE NOW!! < < < 
 
> > > FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED < < < > > > FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED < < < 
 
$ $ $ $ $ - - 1 OF 3, SOLD! ONLY 2 LEFT, NOW!! - - $ $ $ $ $  
 
* * * NOTE * * *  
Whereas I am firm on the pricing of the three "large pack bundles" and the remaining "daypack bundles," my intent in selling these items is not only to recoup a (very) FEW bucks, but to also get rid of the inventory. Therefore, those who buy the already low-priced LARGE pack and Daypack bundles, I am more than willing to throw in a few extras of your choice -- and/or negotiate an even lower price on the extra item/s (provided they're still available). 
 
For the purpose of full disclosure, over the years, I have sampled/tested several different brands and models of backpacks, in return for honest feedback regarding their functionality, size, weight and comfort, etc. Though I've never been paid to do this, I was obviously allowed to keep the backpacks regardless of the feedback. One of the companies was Outdoor Products (OP), though it "was not" the particular daypack I'm offering below. I've never sampled or accepted anything from Alps Mountaineering. Over three years ago, I chose the two backpacks offered below based solely upon their versatility, exceptional construction, price and 101 other reasons -- all based upon my first-hand experience in the field with them.  
 
Also see my listing for 12 expertly hand-painted, camouflaged 5-Gal Buckets and GAMMA SEAL Lids! 
http://phoenix.craigslist.org/cph/for/
  
html 
 
Greetings! 
 
A Little History: 
I am finally getting around to selling the remaining inventory I have from my little start-up business, "The Dual-Survival Backpack," from several years ago. In 2012/13, I had the great idea of offering to the public, a backpack that was fully and completely equipped to go off the grid for between 3-6 days. The idea, I thought (and still do!!), was to have the well-equipped backpack available for people who were looking for a very solid pack -- be they beginning or experienced hikers -- either for just getting away for a few days for a fun-filled time with Mother Nature, or in the event of some kind of disaster/civil unrest/act of terrorism, etc., as a bugout bag.  
 
After I sold several, I suffered two major back-to-back, untreated concussions, while . . . you guessed . . . hiking. Being propelled by a rock hidden in the tall grass, and falling forehead-first on a ground level boulder, just ain't good for ya! The first concussion of the "two in five days," actually caused the second fall and concussion. 
 
Anyhoo, due to the lingering effects of those two concussions (and others, prior:), I found I no longer had what it took to run the business, and kind of closed up shop. Today, I still have some inventory left over that I would finally like to get rid of AT VERY LOW PRICES!! Every single item has been tested backwards and forwards, and I stand by everything to be the best you can buy for the money. And that's NOT to say that any element of these packs are cheaply made; they're NOT!  
 
I don't have all the items that went into the original DSBP pack -- yet I'm not charging the original selling price of $1,100, either. However, the meat-and-potatoes are still in there. No food items are included in these packs.  
 
EVERY ITEM OFFERED IS BRAND NEW! It "may" (and I mean MAY) have been used in a photo shoot or two, but never used! Each LARGE pack (see below); Brand New! * Sleeping bags; Brand New! * Day packs; Brand New! * Stoves; Brand New! * Sleeping bag mats; Brand New! *** ALL of the other items? BRAND NEW! *** Still, everything sold "as is" because of maybe a blemish or two on it??? But everything sold is in 110% working condition! 
  
$ $ $ $ $ - - 1 of 3 LARGE PACKS ALREADY SOLD! ONLY 2 LEFT, NOW!! - - $ $ $ $ $  
 
As I said, I am selling the items in as many "bundles" as I can, thus I've broken down the sale three ways: 
 
1)	LARGE Packs -- $350. ea. (see below) include all the items shown in the photos of that particular bundle. If you're just starting out, or you have a friend who needs a very well stocked, LARGE, long-haul backpack, you can't beat this for price and quality -- guaranteed!!! Were you thinking about trekking a LONG, multi-WEEK trail in one of our beautiful National Parks soon? This is your answer!! 
 
I spent literally weeks-at-a-time testing every part included it in my DSBP packs, making sure that those items that made the final cut, were up to a standard of quality that I was happy to stand behind. Everything that made up my DSBP packs was tested in every temperature and element Arizona has to offer, including four-days in a miserable wet snow storm in Flagstaff, several October days/nights in Utah and horrendous monsoon season thunderstorms, with all the high winds and downpours they can offer and temperatures as high as 105-degrees, during the summer. To this day, dollar-for-dollar, I would change only one or two things about it; THAT'S IT! 
  
2)	Daypacks -- $35. ea. is a STEAL! Do your research . . . I have 10 additional Daypacks that I am selling, and including for FREE, my own, personally made Wilderness First-Aid Kit, a $45. value! This homemade Kit has everything you need, and nothing you don't, for heading off-trail or hiking. As long as supplies last, I'm happy to throw in extras -- also at no additional charge -- such as bug spray, etc., and sell other items, if you're interested, at discounted prices (AS LONG AS SUPPLIES LAST). 
 
3)	Remaining additional items sold singly, or in quantities (WHILE SUPPLIES LAST, Ssee below): 
_______________________________________________________ 
 
List of Items Bundled With LARGE Pack (ONLY! $350. ea):  
- - 1 of 3 LARGE PACKS ALREADY SOLD! ONLY 2 LEFT, NOW!! - - 
 
*  Alps Mountaineering, Cascade 5200 (See the first two photos and list below for included items) 
This is the best, simplest, most well constructed large -- or small -- backpack I've ever owned, and I've own/owned many backpacks! I've had my personal Cascade 5200 for over five years now, and have logged-in well over a thousand miles with this pack on my back (usually weighing in at least 45-50 lbs. fully loaded, with two, full, 3L hydration packs inside). With only three of these left, you might think I'd keep one for myself, but I'm not. My Cascade 5200 shows no signs of giving up -- even in the next five years!  
 
The capacity of this monster is 5200 cubic-inches, 85-liters. To give you an idea of its size, you can place a 2L bottle of soda in each SIDE pocket, with room to spare. The included fanny pack (which can also be used as a pack "topper"), could probably hold two, 2L bottles of soda, but it certainly holds one with much room to spare (See photos). Not that I condone carrying around 2L bottles of soda, just using them as a visual. 
  
More info can be found via the following link. Keep in mind my packs are "olive green," and although they are brand new and unused, they do have a little patch of my company logo affixed to the front, as I used them in photo shoots. 
http://www.alpsmountaineering.com/products/packs/internal-frame-packs/cascade-5200 
 
* * * THE FIRST PERSON TO PURCHASE ONE OF THESE BUNDLES WILL ALSO RECEIVE A PLATYPUS 3L RESERVOIR/BLADDER -- FREE! FREE! FREE! (Sorry, this unit was sold to a very happy buyer, yesterday! You still have a 2L reservoir that comes w/the below-listed Daypack and/or can purchase additional PLATYPUS 3L reservoirs online!) * * *

* Wilderness First-Aid Kit; Handmade by myself based on years of experience and training in Wilderness First-Aid. Easily, a $45. value. I'll put my F-A Kit up against anybody's on the Net. Items included are too much for me to list -- see the photos or write me with any questions

title: ******  LIFTED F150 SUPER CREW LARIAT !!!  ******
description:
One of a kind truck!  Lariat Edition, 5.4 liter V8 engine, 4 door, pearl white paint, all leather, power everything, back up camera, back up sensors, full screen stereo with navigation and voice controls, tinted windows, differential re-geared to same ratio as new Raptors, over sized differential cover, true cold air intake by Volant, programmer, magnaflow exhaust upgrade, 6" pro comp lift, Newer Toyo Open Country A/T tires, BMF black and machined wheels, AMP automatic running boards with LED lights, remote start alarm.....  I am probably missing something, I have done too much!  Actually, yes....I have installed a black grill and black fender flares since I took these pictures.  I will update pictures later today.  I don't race the truck or go off road, I am just a car enthusiast, since I am in the automotive business.  Your truck should look good, sound good, and be able to accelerate when needed!   
 
Truck has 120k miles, which isn't much these days.  I run a auto repair shop, so all repairs done when with Ford OE parts only, no aftermarket crap.  All oil changes performed with Mobil 1 Synthetic with premium filters.  I can only imagine the anxiety of looking for a used vehicle, especially since most people are cheap and don't fix their vehicles when they should or use Auto Zone junk parts.   Cant tell you how many people don't fix their vehicles, because they are going to get rid of it!  Don't be the guy that buys someone else's problems!   If you are looking for a truck that has been professionally maintained, is in perfect condition, and already has all the bells and whistles, this is your truck!  I encourage you to drive it and have it inspected by your own shop!  Truck is in new condition, mechanically, inside and out!   
 
I am the second owner, my co-worker was the original owner.  I am a non smoker.

Searching for a BOSS product?  Check below! 
Body Content: 
 
 
For anyone who is in business and wanting to boost productivities and performance, you require computers that work fast!!  We've got the devices for you: Dell e6430 i7 laptop computer with 3.0ghz, 8 gig ram and packed with 160gb Intel Solid State Drive.  Dell created the Latitude-E6430 with business uses in mind. The outcome is a durable 14-inch notebook that, although it won't win any accolades for style and design, will get the job done FAST in your office environment. It has a responsive spillage-resistant keyboard, a good amount of ports, a Kensington secure slot for security, and a "tri-metal" case which has been rated to withstand harsh temperatures, shock, and dust. Internally, a 160GB solid state drive, 8GB of RAM, and an Intel Core i7-3520M CPU equal a lot of computing horsepower. Along with the 9-cell battery, webcam, backlit keyboard, 1600 x 900 screen resolution, Intel HD graphic, USB 3.0 ports, CD/DVD RW, SD card port, and HDMI port.  Built with stable Windows 7 pro 64 bits OS.  This is a business system with power to boot, you will not go awry with the E6430. 
$359 each. Bulk for discount.

title: 1986 Monte Carlo SS TRADE
description:
1986 Monte Carlo Super Sport. I have owned this car for the past 8 years and have enjoyed every bit of it but the time has come to let the Monty go. It has never been involved in any accidents and is 100% rust-free. Clean & Clear New Mexico title... 
 
Will listen to TRADES.. 
 
bagger , big wheel , rv, 5th wheel , gooseneck, dump trailer, bobcat, loader bucket tractor , pro street , drag , race , grand national,chevelle ,el camino, g body ,Camaro, BBC , SBC , blower , turbo , long travel sand rail , anything along those lines 
 
 
Car is located in Las Cruces NM, 5 hr. drive from Phoenix AZ... this is a legitimate ad and posting in Phx for more exposure. 
 
Crate engine ZZ4 350ci; 
 
 always ran 15w50 mobile 1 synthetic oil  
 
Chevrolet Performance developed these ZZ4 crate engines, which are evolved from the popular ZZ series of small blocks that power thousands of street rods, hot streetcars, circle track racers and drag racers. These ZZ4 350 c.i.d., 4-bolt main, 1-piece rear main seal crate engines have approximately 10.0:1 compression, 355 hp at 5,250 rpm and 405 ft./lbs. of torque at 3,500 rpm. To make this package work Chevrolet Performance has installed forged 1053 steel internally balanced crankshafts, 5.7 in. powdered metal connecting rods with hypereutectic flat top pistons with offset pins. Hydraulic billet steel roller camshafts are installed with .474 in. intake lift, .510 in. exhaust lift and duration at .050 in. for intake is 208, and exhaust is 221 and a lobe centerline of 112 degrees. Stamped steel self-aligning rocker arms with a 1.5:1 ratio are used on cast aluminum 1987-91 Corvette L98 cylinder heads. Which have 58cc combustion chambers, 163cc intake runner volume. They have a 1955-86 bolt pattern with "D" shaped exhaust ports and center bolt valve cover patter layouts, no exhaust heat crossover passages and the ends of the heads are drilled for standard accessory bolt patterns including angle plug configurations. Aluminum dual plane intake manifolds with dual flange set up. 
 
Built 700R4 transmission; B&M 2500 stall converter, B&M Quicksilver ratchet shifter w/reverse lockout, G-Force dual exhaust trans cross member, custom drive shaft 
 
Ignition; Streetfire Hei distributor w/8mm wires  
 
Fuel delivery; Mechanical fuel pump , 770 cfm Holley street avenger carb  
 
Exhaust; Headman Elite Ceramic shorty headers , full dual exhaust with FM mufflers 
 
Cooling; High flow aluminum radiator w/dual electric fans 
 
Suspension; 90/10 Lakewood shocks up front w/ coilovers in the rear 
 
Hvac; rebuilt hvac box ( ac evaporator and heater core replaced)  
 
Body & paint; 
Original factory paint, No body  or paint work ever. Has a couple small dings but no significant damage. Clear coat is also peeling in some places. Overall, car still shows well . 
 
Wheels; Factory 15 inch alloys w/ new tires (does not come with the 17 inch billits in the picture) 
 
This car drives straight as an arrow and stops on a dime. No slop in the steering at all. Most replaceable parts have been replaced w/ factory or upgraded parts. Engine & Trans have less than 10K miles since installed. This is a reliable DRIVER .... 
 
Will listen to Trades

title: 1988 honda xr600r
description:
This is a 1988 honda xr600r. It is set up for a 200- 220 pound rider. the front fork springs have been replaced and shimmed for a larger rider. the rear dampener and spring, have been upgraded to a progressive suspension unit with a stronger spring. The tank has been upgraded to a acerbis 5.5 gallon desert tank with dual petcocks. It has pro taper bars with risers, and bark busters.  
I did a top end rebuild a few hundred miles ago. New piston, piston rings, and valve  
Job. I also replaced the timing chains and guides. 
 
The sprocket have been changed to allow it to ride on the road easier. 
The tire are dot approved knobbies. 
It also has trail tech LCD display, but the speed sensor is not working at this time. 
The exhaust is a super trapp IDS2. 
It is registered and plated(no turn signals though). 
It has a 130 w stator from the factory, so you can put a desert light on without a stator upgrade. 
 
 
This bike is for tall people. Anyone under six foot will have very hard time with it. 
I know how hard it is to find a bike to suit taller/heavier people. 
If you are of larger proportion, this should fit you much better than the others. 
the title is notarized and ready to go! 
 
 
Thanks for looking, 
I do not need help selling this bike! 
I would consider a trade for a working name brand(miller, Lincoln, etc.) tig and stick welder with argon bottle and accessories.

title: 1996 GMS Drums - 6 piece drum set - RARE AND AMAZING!!!
description:
This is a USA made GMS 6 piece drum set that I am selling.  It is a great looking and awesome sounding versatile kit!  With 4 toms you can really adjust to the style and genre of music you want to play. 
 
I am willing to sell with or without hardware - it all needs to go. 
 
GMS Drums are a boutique drum manufacturer from NY and make some amazing drums!  http://gmsdrums.com/ This is a kit built in 1996 that features maple shells with a white lacquer finish.  (see photo with stamp, they are all stamped but I didn't photo each one) 
1996 was the year they introduced their proprietary suspension mounting system as is featured on these drums. 
These are without a doubt some of the best sounding drums I've had the chance to own 
 
Specs: 
24" Bass 
10", 12", 13", 16" Toms 
14"x6" Snare - matching maple 
 
Tom heads are within a year old, never gigged with them and are Evans 360 2-ply heads, nice versatile sound, with a good balance of attack and resonance.  Snare has a Remo Controlled Sound coated head.  Drum kick head is an Evan Emad 2 with dampening ring (don't know the age) and the bass resonant head is the original with the GMS logo, the previous owner had put a piece of tape on a tear, doesn't affect the sound too much that I can tell but doesn't look the best either.    
 
The hardware is a bit of a mixed bag including Gibraltar hi hat (also a ludwig hi hat stand) (2) DW double braced boom/straight combo cymbal stands and a Tama single braced boom/straight combo cymbal stand, also a DW 5000 double chain single bass pedal.  There are a few misc. hardware pieces that I can include as welL. 
 
Cymbals: 
14" hi hat including ZHT Mastersound on top and Zildjian Aveidas on bottom. 
18" A Custom Zildjian Crash 
20" Sabian El Sabor Ride  
14" Sabian B8 Crash 
  
These drums are 21 years old and are in really great, but not perfect shape; however dollar for dollar these rival or top the likes or similar drum company's high end line of drums. There's not many of these being sold around the country, look around and you will see. 
I am open to offers, contact me to discuss more.  Thanks 
 
Tags: DW Tama Sonor Pearl Ludwig Master Star Classic DP Orange County SE Custom bubinga maple birch clear acrylic lugs buy sell must sell trade stage professional pro touring gig gigging cases
attributes: excellent GMS Drums 6 Piece Drums Set

title: Lenovo X1 Carbon Ultrabook Notebook - i7 / 8gb RAM / 256 SSD *EXTRAS*
description:
I write code for a living.   
 
What I am offering for sale is a total computing solution rather than a mere computer.  I bought it as a graduation present to myself for $1200 a couple years ago it was incredibly fast then and even faster now. 
 
The lenovo x1 carbon is pretty much the perfect amount of machine.  It masterfully blends power and performance while not cutting many corners.  Here are the raw specs, they kind of tell most of the story: 
 
Lenovo X1 Carbon, weighs 2 lbs 15 oz (see picture) 
 
Intel i5 2.5ghz multi core processor Hyper-Threading Technology, Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 3mb cache, integrated memory controller 
 
8GB 1333 MHz PC3-10600 Ram 
 
120 GB Solid State Disk Drive 
 
Intel HD Graphics 4000 
 
Full size spill-resistant backlit keyboard 
 
Buttonless touchpad (like a macbook pro) 
 
Bluetooth 4.0, Ethernet, Fast Ethernet, Gigabit Ethernet 
 
Mini DisplayPort, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, headphone/microphone combo jack 
 
Fingerprint Scanner 
 
and all this is encased in a durable and impossibly light carbon fiber, magnesium-aluminum alloy frame. 
 
This machine cost $1500 in 2012 and it's easy to see why. 
 
 
If i had any complaints about this machine then it was merely  too few output ports.  Fret not, I got you covered, remember when I said total computing solution? 
 
So I am including with this machine - A docking station/port replicator that will send outputs to three different displays (that's a lotta desktop) as well as add an additional. 
 
When you plug this dock into the lenovo you will instantly add the following ports to the Carbon X1 
 
2 x USB 3.0 -- 1 provides always-on mobile device charging 
2 x USB 2.0 
1 x DVI-D 
1x Gigabit Ethernet 
1x Stereo/Mic Combo Port 
 
So in other words, you can leave a wireless mouse, wireless keyboard, a larger external display, a printer, and an external DVD drive plugged in to the stationary dock, and when you get home, plug the dock into your carbon and your home office springs to life.   
 
It's a pretty damn cool setup.  My price may seem high, but there's a reason for that.  I've done all the work for you, and am including several accessories.  this is ready to go. 
 
THIS WILL ALSO COME WITH A FULLY ACTIVATED COPY OF MS OFFICE 2016 PROFESSIONAL PLUS & PHOTOSHOP CS6 PREINSTALLED ON THE COMPUTER.   
 
Computer is Mint 
 
I have many other computers and parts for sale, to see the others click 'more ads by this user' to see the rest. 
 
As with all my computers i offer a 'no questions asked'  refund within the first 15 days and a replace/repair warranty for the first 30. 
 
I am very easy to deal with, and i encourage you to ask me any questions you have about this or about laptops in general, this is my favorite topic.

Hot cams, I have a stage 2 and a stage 3 Performance cams with only a few hours of ride/dyno time on them. Asking $125 each.  
 
I also have several OEM stock cams if you need one. 
 
Skat Trak Edge Haulers on 9 inch Douglas Blue Label wheels in great shape. Asking $150 OBO  
I am sure I have a set of front sand tires that I can match up with these rears.  
 
Other sets are available, let me know what you are looking for.  
 
2004 - 2015 Trx450r 450er misc rear fenders (no 400ex fenders), some lights and many many other parts. Let me know what you need, and we can go from there on the prices. 
  
Honda Suzuki sport quad wheels and tires, sand and desert. Skat Trak Haulers on Douglas Blue Label wheels, ITP and other brands of sand tires. Text me for the specific tire you are looking for. 
  
White powder coated PSR ATV jacks great for a quick change of tires, change the oils, lube the chain, or just to get the quad off of the ground to work on. They are pretty much universal and sell for about $70 a piece new. These haven't been used but a few times. Asking $75 for the pair. 
  
Call or text is probably best, I never check my emails. Oh and all silly offers will just be ignored ;-) 
  
TRADES: 
 I will entertain some trades. Snap On Matco tools no Harbor Freight tools, objects like Weatherby stuff ar15 optics Vortex Nightforce Swarovski high end scopes reloading equipment RCBS Hornady. Or let me know what you have, but please no projects! I have enough of them right now!

The Model T Series offers many features our competition can't afford to include like; the famous Sargent & Greenleaf lock, internal ball bearing hinges, and 100% active door bolts. Lock-up is accomplished with 8 active, 1-inch diameter, door bolts, including top and bottom bolts. The Model T safe has an attractive textured grey finish with chrome three spoke handle and dial. The interior is covered with velour (except sidewalls).

title: Lenovo X1 Carbon Ultrabook Notebook - i7 / 8gb RAM / 256 SSD *EXTRAS*
description:
I write code for a living.   
 
What I am offering for sale is a total computing solution rather than a mere computer.  I bought it as a graduation present to myself for $1200 a couple years ago it was incredibly fast then and even faster now. 
 
The lenovo x1 carbon is pretty much the perfect amount of machine.  It masterfully blends power and performance while not cutting many corners.  Here are the raw specs, they kind of tell most of the story: 
 
Lenovo X1 Carbon, weighs 2 lbs 15 oz (see picture) 
 
Intel i5 2.5ghz multi core processor Hyper-Threading Technology, Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 3mb cache, integrated memory controller 
 
8GB 1333 MHz PC3-10600 Ram 
 
120 GB Solid State Disk Drive 
 
Intel HD Graphics 4000 
 
Full size spill-resistant backlit keyboard 
 
Buttonless touchpad (like a macbook pro) 
 
Bluetooth 4.0, Ethernet, Fast Ethernet, Gigabit Ethernet 
 
Mini DisplayPort, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, headphone/microphone combo jack 
 
Fingerprint Scanner 
 
and all this is encased in a durable and impossibly light carbon fiber, magnesium-aluminum alloy frame. 
 
This machine cost $1500 in 2012 and it's easy to see why. 
 
 
If i had any complaints about this machine then it was merely  too few output ports.  Fret not, I got you covered, remember when I said total computing solution? 
 
So I am including with this machine - A docking station/port replicator that will send outputs to three different displays (that's a lotta desktop) as well as add an additional. 
 
When you plug this dock into the lenovo you will instantly add the following ports to the Carbon X1 
 
2 x USB 3.0 -- 1 provides always-on mobile device charging 
2 x USB 2.0 
1 x DVI-D 
1x Gigabit Ethernet 
1x Stereo/Mic Combo Port 
 
So in other words, you can leave a wireless mouse, wireless keyboard, a larger external display, a printer, and an external DVD drive plugged in to the stationary dock, and when you get home, plug the dock into your carbon and your home office springs to life.   
 
It's a pretty damn cool setup.  My price may seem high, but there's a reason for that.  I've done all the work for you, and am including several accessories.  this is ready to go. 
 
THIS WILL ALSO COME WITH A FULLY ACTIVATED COPY OF MS OFFICE 2016 PROFESSIONAL PLUS & PHOTOSHOP CS6 PREINSTALLED ON THE COMPUTER.   
 
Computer is Mint

title: Moblie bicycle mechanic
description:
PLEASE READ MY ENTIRE SERVICES AND REPAIRS OPTIONS BEFORE HAND. 
THANK YOU. 
 
Hey fellow riders starting my own mobile bicycle mechanic service up again now that the weather will be a little warmer for the families and avid cyclists that dont want to wait a few days to go on a ride Iam at your service.I have been riding an working on bikes for 10yrs at a shop level I have worked in a few well know shops in the valley. I specialize in all types of bikes heres just a small list, bmx race an freestyle dirt jumpers mountain bikes road bikes beach cruisers kids bikes trikes tandems folding ......IF IT HAS A MOTOR I WILL NOT BE ABLE TO FIX IT. 
 
My services include any type of maintenance parts swaps full tune ups bike builds brake bleeds tubeless install custom builds frame swaps tear downs for that fresh paint job an much more. Prices vary and are negotiable. I can come to you at home or at the office also offer a drop off service were you can drop off your bike with me an ill have it done for you while you wait or by the time you need it drop off details an schedule to be discussed upon request of that service. Iam very professional an take this seriously i work around your schedule an time that you set up to have your bike fixed. 
 
Basic price list of common repairs : 
 
Gear adjustment front an rear $10  
 
Brake adjustment front an rear $10  
 
Tube change $5 a wheel  
 
Spot tru $10 
 
Chain replacement $4  
 
Brake bleed $15 each (at the moment i do not have mineral oil )  
 
Chainring swaps $5 (new chain recommend) 
 
Hub overhaul prices: 
Coaster brake hub $25  
Basic hub $10  
Sealed hubs $15 (only recommend if bearings are destroyed an need replacement) 
Freecoaster bmx hubs i recommend taking to the shop as i do not have replacement parts. 
 
 
Quotes on replacement or value are available as well but will include a gas fee if i drive to you and a $20 charge for my time. I will right out a detailed description of all damages or a full parts list. I recommend this service to be done from my home that way i am able to type it up an print it out with correct pricing and replacement parts options an prices. 
 
Mobile services requirements 
Rules schedule an details:  
 
How to begin- before contacting me check your bike over and see what parts must be purchased if any. Then check your schedule and what kind of time frame you have for either at home or at the office. Then whatever services or repairs needed keep handy an shoot me a text with what repairs you need done where you are located an what time is best for you. Then i will schedule you in and contact you before i arrive. Upon arrival i will set up my stand check your bike over first inform you of anything else i see may be wrong and address the issue if no parts are needed i will begin the repairs or tune up right then an there once finished take it on a quick test ride then have you test ride it and if anything isnt done to your satisfaction i will take care of it before i leave an make sure that you are 100% satisfied before i leave. 
 
Drop off requirements and details: The drop off service is something i offer as well its a service i offer for those of you who need your bike fixed that day an have a busy schedule or work. How it works. I have you drop off your bike or bikes at my front door an then the time frame of pick up is discussed an what is being done to the bike or bikes ( must have the replacement parts if any) then youll get a number slip an so will the bike or bikes and you can do what you gotta do an i will call when finished or if you finish early you may come back an wait till it is finished. ALL DROP OFFS ARE DONE THAT DAY AND PICKED UP THAT DAY IF UNABLE TO PICK UP I CAN DROP OFF FOR EXTRA FEE. I DO NOT HOLD BIKES AS I AM NOT A SHOP WITH THE SPACE. This service is a option an sometimes you may be given an appointment day pending on labor  
 
TUNE UPS  
Basic tune up includes brake adjustment (does not include bleeds cable only) gear adjustment spot tru on both wheels quick drive train clean an lube tire pressure check a quick run through to make sure everything is tight an then a quick clean $25  
 
Pro tune up: (includes everything in the basic tune) 
Both wheels removed for hub bearing inspection cranks removed for bottom bracket inspection cleaning an repacked with grease if unsealed headset inspection cleaning an repacked with grease if unsealed full cleaning an degreasing of drivetrain an relubed and wheel tru $ 50 
 
Advanced tune up: includes everything in the basic an pro tunes an recives the following...everything is removed from the frame and is cleaned,inspected,re greased, re lubed an then put back on the frame. When wanting this specific tune up you should purchase the following recommend parts: brake cable an housing for cable pull brakes shifter cables an housing with cable ends new chain new brake pads new rotors for disc brakes ( recommend when having new cables an housing ran new chain installed and for the everyday cyclists or when doing a frame swap) $100

description:
Selling a white/gold iPad Mini 4, 16GB in capacity. 
 
I received this brand new iPad Apple as a replacement for another iPad that wasn't working properly, just a few days before the warranty period ended. 
 
This is a brand new iPad. It has never been used and it is still in the original plastic foil. 
The screen looks blurry in the photos because the plastic that covers the screen is a foggy white. The screen itself will be flawless and crystal clear. 
 
The iPad is CLEAN and ready to use! 
No contract, no iCloud lock, no shady stuff. 
 
As as brand new iPad, this makes for a perfect gift! 
 
The iPad comes with a FREE original Apple charging cable, and original wall charger!  
(What you see is what you get: no box or other accessories are included.) 
 
The iPad is still on iOS 9 (this is how I got it from Apple) but can easily be updated to iOS 10 for free. 
The only reason I haven't updated it yet is because I know some people prefer iOS 9, as it makes it easier to jailbreak the device.

title: Apogee MiC 96k (USB) - iPad, iPhone, Mac
description:
Best USB mic you will find. 
 
I bought 2 of these Apogee MiC 96k's a year ago from Amazon for $498.08 (total with tax).   Today, the price is still the same on Amazon: 
 
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00HHEVL3C/ref=s9_al_bw_g267_i2 
 
As you might expect from an Apogee product - the sound quality is superb.  If you come over to purchase it, I can play you an electronic music track that I made where every single sound used was recorded with this mic (the song isn't released yet so I don't want to post a link here). 
 
As the name suggests, it can record up to 96kHz sample rate.  And the great thing is that it's USB bus-powered.  So you can go on a road trip and have high-quality recordings simply by plugging it into your iPhone, iPad, (or laptop).   They also come with their own little desktop stands, but have a separate extension if you want to mount it onto a real mic stand (see pictures).  More info here: 
 
http://www.apogeedigital.com/products/mic 
 
But, apart from the track I mentioned above, I have barely used them, and I'm realizing that I have too many mic's, and I can't afford to have so many. 
 
So I'm parting with one or two of these Apogee mic's.   I'm selling one for $200 (which is about $50 less than what you would pay online), or two for $400 (which would be about $100 less than what you would pay online). 
 
Price is firm - it's a great discount for a top-of-the-line brand product.  No low-ball offers please. 
 
Serious buyers only - cash only.

Sharper, smarter, and better, the Bluetooth-enabled 3rd Generation Apple iPad is nothing short of a technological breakthrough. The Retina display of The new iPad, with 2048-by-1536 resolution (that's four times the number of pixels in iPad 2 and a million more than an 1080P HDTV) and 44 percent greater color saturation, yields amazingly detailed and sharp images. Featuring a 5 MP iSight camera with a backside illumination sensor, this Apple iPad will delight you with its exceptionally rich photos and the ability to take 1080p HD videos. The built-in Apple A5X chip with quad-core graphics powers the 3.1 million pixels contained in the 9.7-inch display and generates an unfaltering response for all sorts of operations on this Apple iPad. Your voice will be its command - the Dictation feature in the 3rd Generation Apple iPad types as you speak, be it e-mails or status updates on social networking sites. What's more, the AirPlay feature in The new iPad lets you wirelessly stream your favorite stuff to your speakers or an HDTV.

title: Zagg Slim Book Wireless Keyboard & Detachable Case For 9.7-inch iPad P
description:
BRAND NEW IN THE BOX! 
 
Zagg FULL Info Link: http://www.zagg.com/us/en_us/keyboards/slim-book-pro-ipad-pro-9-7 
 
Thin: Its ultrathin design is easy to carry when you're on the go. 
Bright: Backlit, island-style keys maximize space for faster, more natural typing, even in low-light situations. 
Multi-Angled: Its unique hinge offers 135 degrees of viewing angles, just like a laptop. 
Keyboard Mode offers backlit keys and the largest typing area for fast, accurate typing 
Video Mode holds the iPad securely at virtually any viewing angle. 
Case Mode protects the iPad and allows users to quickly separate it from the keyboard. 
Book Mode helps protect the iPad while making reading easy. 
Lasting: A powerful lithium polymer battery provides up to two years of regular use between charges. 
 
 
ZAGG Slim Book Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard: 
 
The ZAGG Slim Book keyboard and detachable case is the ultra-slim solution to your mobile typing needs. Its unique hinge secures your tablet at virtually any viewing angle and allows for a convenient keyboard, video, and book mode, it also folds flat for a protective case mode. The Slim Book is powered by one of the industry's most powerful batteries that keeps you typing for up to two years between charges. 
 
 
Long Lasting:  
 
The Slim Book's powerful, rechargeable battery provides up to two years of typing between charges. Two years! Think of all the things you can get done without stopping to charge. 
 
 
Case Mode: 
 
Case mode protects your iPad from scratches and dings while you're on the go. It also makes separating your iPad Pro from your keyboard simple so you can easily enjoy the best of both worlds. 
 
Keyboard Mode: 
 
Keyboard mode makes typing fast and natural by offering the largest typing area and backlit island-style keys that respond just like a traditional keyboard. 
 
Book Mode: 
 
Book mode allows you to reverse your iPad Pro into a convenient, comfortable reading mode that keeps your iPad and keyboard protected while you read. 
 
Video Mode: 
 
Video mode uses the Slim Book's unique hinge to secure your iPad Pro at virtually any viewing angle so you can easily share videos with everyone. 
 
 
Product Description: 
 
The ZAGG Slim Book wireless Bluetooth keyboard is the ultrathin solution to your mobile typing needs. Its unique hinge secures your tablet at virtually any viewing angle and allows for a convenient video and book mode, or folds flat for a protective case mode. The Slim Book is powered by one of the industry's most powerful batteries that keeps it going for up to two years between charges. 
 
 
Technical Details Summary: 
 
Wireless Type:	 Bluetooth 
Brand Name: ZAGG 
Item model number: ID7ZF2-BB0 
Hardware Platform:	 Apple iOS 
Item Weight: 3.7 pounds 
Product Dimensions: 14.4 x 10.1 x 1.5 inches 
Item Dimensions: L x W x H	14.4 x 10.1 x 1.5 inches 
Color: Black 
Power Source: Battery 
Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (INCLUDED) 
 
 
ZAGG Slim Book Reviews: 
 
"The keyboard on the Zagg Slim Book is one of the best we've tested on a keyboard case so far. It has excellent, well-spaced, solid keys that are all in their rightful, familiar place, and they have springy feedback and satisfying travel." -- PC Mag Editor's Choice Award. 
 
"In just a short while, the ZAGG Slim Book has become my favorite keyboard for use with the iPad Air. It doesn't lack a feature I consider desirable, and it serves my every need. There is not a single thing I would change as ZAGG has gotten it just right. This makes the Slim Book deserve the rare rating of a perfect 10." -- James Kendrick for Mobile News, ZDNet Review.

title: TABLET / IPAD SCREEN LCD Fixed
Behringer X18 Professional 18-Channel Mixer for IPAD or Android
description:
Behringer X18 Professional 18-Channel Mixer for IPAD Android Tablet 
UPC: 696859053849 
Visit our showroom to check them out! HOT BEAT 166-05 Jamaica Ave., Jamaica NY 11432 
Call us 7I8-29I-I552 
 
The Behringer X18 - Compact 18-Input Digital iPad/Tablet Mixer is designed for live sound reinforcement and recording applications. The device is designed to sit flat on a surface and features 16 top-facing MIDAS-designed fully programmable microphone preamps via balanced combination Line Level TRS and Microphone XLR-3F connectors, an integrated Wi-Fi module for wireless control from an iPad or tablet, and an 18 x 18 channel bi-directional USB audio interface.  
 
The mixer can be controlled via a free iOS or PC application when connected to an Ethernet, LAN, or Wi-Fi network. Controlling the mixer using a portable device allows you to reference your mix from different listening positions within the venue or studio. The free control app includes four stereo (eight mono) multi-effect processors including delay, chorus, dynamics, 31-band EQ, and simulations of classic analog equipment such as the Lexicon 480L and PCM 80, EMT 250, and Quantec QRS reverbs. The application also includes a 100-band Real Time Analyzer (RTA) for every channel and bus EQ.  
 
The mixer is also capable of sending up to 16 digital sources over CAT5e cable to ULTRANET-compatible devices such as Behringer's P16-M personal monitor mixer for musicians as well as Turbosound iQ loudspeakers for PA applications. Additional I/O include two XLR main outputs, six TRS outputs for auxiliary bus sends, MIDI In, MIDI Out, stereo RCA inputs, stereo RCA outputs, and a headphone output with dedicated level control. You can record your mix via the 18 x 18 USB interface using your digital audio workstation (DAW) of choice. The mixer comes with a copy of Tracktion 4 Audio Production software which provides unlimited track counts, MIDI recording and automation of track dynamics, and support for VST and AU plug-ins. 
 
16 Programmable MIDAS Preamps 
Provides audio inputs via combination 1/4" TRS and XLR-3F connectors 
Built-In Wi-Fi Module 
Enable wireless control over mixer using app for iPad or tablet 
18x18 Bidirectional USB Audio Interface 
Enables recording of mixer output into digital audio workstation of choice 
Virtual FX Rack 
Leverages internal 40-bit floating point DSP to apply dynamic processing as well as reverbs and EQ 
100-Band Real Time Analyzer 
Provides visual feedback for making boost or cuts to specific frequencies 
ULTRANET 
Enables connection via CAT5e cable to P16-M personal monitoring system and Turbosound iQ speakers 
 
INPUTS 
16x combination XLR-3F/TRS inputs with MIDAS designed preamps 
2x RCA inputs (stereo pair) 
1x MIDI in 
 
OUTPUTS 
2x XLR-3M main outputs 
2x RCA outputs (stereo pair) 
6x 1/4" aux sends 
1x MIDI out 
1x ULTRANET 
1x Ethernet port for remote control 
1x USB type B for 18 x 18 audio interface 
1x 1/4" stereo headphone with dedicated volume control

title: 9.7" APPLE IPAD 3RD GEN 64GB /SIRI /QUAD CORE GRAPHICS/WORKS GREAT !!!
description:
Detailed item info 
 
 
 
Product Information  
Sharper, smarter, and better, the Bluetooth-enabled 3rd Generation Apple iPad is nothing short of a technological breakthrough. The Retina display of The new iPad, with 2048-by-1536 resolution (that's four times the number of pixels in iPad 2 and a million more than an 1080P HDTV) and 44 percent greater color saturation, yields amazingly detailed and sharp images. Featuring a 5 MP iSight camera with a backside illumination sensor, this Apple iPad will delight you with its exceptionally rich photos and the ability to take 1080p HD videos. The built-in Apple A5X chip with quad-core graphics powers the 3.1 million pixels contained in the 9.7-inch display and generates an unfaltering response for all sorts of operations on this Apple iPad. Your voice will be its command - the Dictation feature in the 3rd Generation Apple iPad types as you speak, be it e-mails or status updates on social networking sites. What's more, the AirPlay feature in The new iPad lets you wirelessly stream your favorite stuff to your speakers or an HDTV.

Product Information  
Sharper, smarter, and better, the Bluetooth-enabled 3rd Generation Apple iPad is nothing short of a technological breakthrough. The Retina display of The new iPad, with 2048-by-1536 resolution (that's four times the number of pixels in iPad 2 and a million more than an 1080P HDTV) and 44 percent greater color saturation, yields amazingly detailed and sharp images. Featuring a 5 MP iSight camera with a backside illumination sensor, this Apple iPad will delight you with its exceptionally rich photos and the ability to take 1080p HD videos. The built-in Apple A5X chip with quad-core graphics powers the 3.1 million pixels contained in the 9.7-inch display and generates an unfaltering response for all sorts of operations on this Apple iPad. Your voice will be its command - the Dictation feature in the 3rd Generation Apple iPad types as you speak, be it e-mails or status updates on social networking sites. What's more, the AirPlay feature in The new iPad lets you wirelessly stream your favorite stuff to your speakers or an HDTV.

title: Original Xbox Modification Service (NOT xbox 360)
description:
I can modify your ORIGINAL Xbox (not xbox 360) within minutes to do some amazing things. Some main features are : 
 
-over 14,000 games for Nintendo, Super Nintendo, Colecovision, Sega Genesis/32x, Arcade/MAME, NeoGeo, Atari 2600/5200/7800, n64, and more 
-if it is connected to the internet then it can practically any movie/TV show/live events 
-play burnt/backup copies of Xbox games 
-other features as well 
 
http://chicagogamingmod.byethost7.com/original-xbox-modification/ 
 
Questions and Answers: 
 
1) How long does the entire process take? 
A: I can have the entire job done and show you a demo on how to use all the main features within 30 minutes 
 
2) Do you need to bring anything besides the Xbox? 
A: YES, I will need you to bring the Xbox, and at least 1 working controller. I will have the cables and everything else 
 
3) where will we meet to get the service done?  
A: I will meet you at a local business thats a very public/safe and relaxing atmosphere. The location will have everything we need to get the job done (tv, wifi, space, permission, etc)  
 
4) will I come meet you?  
A: I'm sorry but I can't do this for a number of reasons, main reason being due to the technical needs of the nature of the job I will need you to come to me 
 
5) do I do discounts for multiple services? 
A: YES! But, this is only discounted when services are done on the same visit (I mean no offense, but you'd be suprised how many people say "give me a discount because I MIGHT refer you lol) 
 
6) Which other services do I do? 
A: I can modify the Wii, and Wiiu to do VERY similar things (no other systems tho currently, only original Xbox and Wii/WiiU) 
I can also do Kodi setups better than virtually anyone else in chicago. I have been on the Kodi/XBMC scene since its start in 2005(i'm not just some one who watched a youtube video on the topic lol) 
 
7) Will you get continued support in the future? 
A: YES! I pride myself on separating myself from others

title: BROKEN XBOX ONE AND PS4???BLOD??HDMI PORT??!!!!!!!
description:
CALL NOW  
  
 
 
* If your PS4 turns on and the white light comes on but there is no picture on the TV 
* Bent or broken pins inside the HDMI port 
* The TV might say "no signal" or something similar with the console hooked up via the HDMI cable 
* A crooked port or one that looks like it's been pushed in further than it should be. 
 
HOW TO FIX A PS4 HDMI PORT? 
 
The ports on these consoles can be extremely difficult to repair unless you have expert level soldering and electronics repair skills. They are soldered onto the motherboard with 4 main pins with lots of solder, then they also have 19 very small pins that also have to be soldered onto solder pads on the motherboard. 
 
The only good and permanent fix for a bad HDMI port is to replace the entire port. Some of them just have pins that have been pushed back so they no longer make contact with the pins on the cable. Even though many times you can push these pins back, there is no good way to keep them there. The whole port needs to be replaced in order to fix this permanently. 
 
We offer an HDMI port fix that is reliable. We have the experience to repair your PS4 correctly and quickly the first time. We fix dozens of these and have a very high success rate.
